title: This weighted blanket has over 4,000 glowing reviews—and it's on sale
text:
This weighted blanket has over 4,000 glowing reviews—and it's on sale

A gravity blanket will be on everyone's wishlist this year, so why not save on it? (Photo: Reviewed / Camryn Rabideau)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

For the restless sleepers among us—I understand your plight. There's no worse feeling than lying awake at night staring at the ceiling, trying to catch those elusive ZZZ's in vain. Instead of succumbing to a life of tossing and turning however, there's a product out there designed to provide that restful sleep you've been craving. Spoiler alert: I'm talking about a weighted blanket. And just in time for the holidays, we found a sweet deal on Amazon's #1 best-seller—the YnM weighted blanket.

With a near perfect 4.4-star rating out of more than 4,300 reviews, the YnM weighted blanket is the perfect option to investigate the craze over this ultra relaxing bedding, without breaking the bank. Right now if you clip the on-page coupon, you can get $15 off any size and color you choose. While weighted blankets often cost well over $100, the YnM is available as low as $43 with this coupon, a small price to pay for our favorite affordable blanket that may just help relieve your stress and anxiety as you drift off.

Even for those who aren't necessarily cuddly sleepers, the hug-like feeling that you get from a weighted blanket is known to instantly create a gentle, soothing effect. The YnM has a 7-layer design including a glass bead fill that surrounds your body and distributes pressure evenly so you fall asleep faster. Its materials also include a premium cotton and cooling bamboo to ensure breathability and ultimate comfort.

Whether you know someone with a weighted blanket on their wishlist this upcoming holiday season, or just want to snuggle up with one yourself this winter, this deal on the YnM makes it a great time to save on one. Psst, if you'd like to spring for a more expensive option, Drop is also having a sale on the Ethohome Gravis weighted blanket which looks ultra plush.
